item.description:
AIC and the New England Friends of Bosnia and Herzegovina present “Celebrate
Bosnia,” a Ramadan reprisal of this spring’s hit Bosnian Intercultural Mixer. We’ll break-
fast with Bosnian cuisine as we come together in celebration of Boston’s vibrant Bosnian
community. This event will also feature traditional folk music and dance!

As Ramadan’s month-long fast instills a special appreciation for giving, proceeds from the event will be donated to the Pine Street Inn, a local homeless shelter. During last year’s “Help End Hunger” campaign, we donated over 400 pounds of cereal on behalf of the AIC community. This year, our goal is to triple our impact by raising $5,000 – enough to donate over 1,500 pounds of food to the Pine Street Inn.

﻿Tickets can be purchased at the following web site: http://w﻿ww.aicongress.org/get-involvedevent/boston-celebrate-bosnia-iftar

 

For the past two years this event has been SOLD OUT! Space is limited - if you are planning on going you should buy your ticket as soon as possible.  Please post with you RSVP whether nor not you have a ticket.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting at the entrance of the AIC center until 8:00

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate Heritage: Bosnian Iftar
